task.title: How to Divide Numbers?
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the division feature of JPS Calculator App

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is dicivison.

result.p: The result from the division is displayed.

example.p: You want to divide 6 from 3. The equation will look like 6/3=2. You enter 6. Press divide. Enter 3. Press equals.
The result 2 will appear on the screen.
